item.title: How to configure statusnet default language
item.author: liuzh66@gmail.com (刘征 Martin Liu)
item.description: If you are playing with statusnet, I bet you could not change default language; English language just shows every where. So I’d like to write a quick guide to show you how to change perferred langguage as zh_cn. I have a Ubuntu server with only English language pack. [bash] root@lamp www/statusnet# locale -a C POSIX en_GB [/bash] I searched and install Chinese language pack by aptitide [bash] root@lamp www/statusnet# aptitude
